parameters.name: is_available
parameters.description: check if the housing is free

x-code-samples.source:
curl -X GET -G "/api/housings" \
    -H "Authorization: Bearer eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.eyJpc3MiOiJod"

is_available.description: allows to know if the housing is available. Default = false

housings.*.is_available.description: allows to know if the housing is available. Default = false

x-code-samples.source:
curl -X POST "/api/housings" \
    -H "Authorization: Bearer eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.eyJpc3MiOiJod" \

    -d "description"="p(V0J2G6KB2u" \
    -d "longitude"="55.23670479" \
    -d "latitude"="703.530758202" \
    -d "rooms_number"="12" \
    -d "is_available"="false" \
    -d "owner_id"="0agcT1O_=-,m" \
    -d "geo_entity_id"="vt#^vjr-nf'v" \
    -d "type_housing_id"="$t:a)g^pWndQ" \
    -d "housing_id"="w$Du3]y\2D9]" \
    -d "housings"="[]" \
    -d "housings.*.description"="lsL>Z\lzc<\U" \
    -d "housings.*.rooms_number"="20" \
    -d "housings.*.is_available"="false" \
    -d "housings.*.owner_id"="6yEO0R78bW?3" \
    -d "housings.*.geo_entity_id"="=^yj?@[^_$Z#" \
    -d "housings.*.type_housing_id"="yf=gwqGe(gK>" \
    -d "housings.*.housing_id"="z\J~5A9UzGxR"

const url = new URL("/api/housings");

let headers = {
    "Authorization": "Bearer eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.eyJpc3MiOiJod",
    "Accept": "application/json",
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
}

let body = JSON.stringify({
    "description": "p(V0J2G6KB2u",
    "longitude": "55.23670479",
    "latitude": "703.530758202",
    "rooms_number": "12",
    "is_available": "",
    "owner_id": "0agcT1O_=-,m",
    "geo_entity_id": "vt#^vjr-nf'v",
    "type_housing_id": "$t:a)g^pWndQ",
    "housing_id": "w$Du3]y\2D9]",
    "housings": "[]",
    "housings.*.description": "lsL>Z\lzc<\U",
    "housings.*.rooms_number": "20",
    "housings.*.is_available": "",
    "housings.*.owner_id": "6yEO0R78bW?3",
    "housings.*.geo_entity_id": "=^yj?@[^_$Z#",
    "housings.*.type_housing_id": "yf=gwqGe(gK>",
    "housings.*.housing_id": "z\J~5A9UzGxR",
})

fetch(url, {
    method: "POST",
    headers: headers,
    body: body
})
    .then(response => response.json())
    .then(json => console.log(json));
